If you’re a highly motivated self-starter who wants to be an integral part of an award-winning team, then Langan is the place for you! Our award-winning, 1000+ person, multi-disciplinary firm can offer you the challenge, responsibility, and growth potential you deserve. We are seeking a Civil, Geotechnical, or GeoEnvironmental Engineer or Environmental Scientist - Entry to 3 Years Experience in our Parsippany, NJ office. As the successful candidate, you will be working on both small-scale and large-scale geotechnical and environmental projects. You will work in both the field and the office. Office duties will include but are not limited to: assisting with the preparation of technical reports, specifications, plans, data management, evaluation, designing foundations, retaining walls, and other geotechnical aspects of construction, environmental assessment and remediation. Field duties will include but are not limited to: performing field inspections associated with geotechnical and foundation projects, environmental investigations; remediation of contaminated properties; air, soil, soil gas and groundwater sampling; and field oversight of remediation activities and subcontractors. Individuals must possess a professional demeanor, as well as strong technical and communication skills, and a desire to learn.

Job Requirements:

• Bachelor's degree in Civil, Environmental, or Geotechnical Engineering or Environmental Science required; Master's degree preferred;
  • Minimum cumulative GPA of 3.0;

    • EIT Certification preferred;
  • For entry level candidates, related internship experience is desired;
  • FE/EIT certification preferred;
  • Drilling, sampling, and environmental experience preferred;
  • Field experience with construction monitoring is preferred;
  • Must be willing to spend at least 75 percent of their time working in the field;
  • Excellent communication skills, written and verbal;
  • Strong attention to detail with excellent analytical and judgment capabilities;
  • Ability to effectively work independently and in a team environment;
  • Possess reliable transportation to access job sites and a valid driver’s license in good standing;
  • Overnight travel may be required; and,
  • Position requires work Monday through Friday with occasional evenings and weekends.
Please submit resume, cover letter and academic transcripts.
